Date of Show Nov PERIOD  

Where Gymnasium

Carlos Santana performed in the gymnasium at Stony Brook University on Sunday Nov PERIOD   at  p.m PERIOD By this year he was already widely famous PERIOD In an article from a Nov PERIOD   issue of The Statesman student reporter Ellen Breidner noted that a round of applause was needed for the Stony Brook Concerts for the great show they put on PERIOD

Santana has won  Grammy Awards and threeLatin Grammy Awards PERIOD The bands early success capped off by a memorable performance at Woodstock in  led to them signing a recording contract with Columbia Records PERIOD The  Woodstock performance introduced the band to an international audience and gained critical acclaim PERIOD

Santanas record sales in the 1990s were very low resulting with the group not having a contract PERIOD However Arista Records Clive Davis signed him and encouraged him to record a starstudded album with mostly younger artists PERIOD The result was 1999s Supernatural PERIOD That album is best known for the hit single Smootha dynamic number cowritten and sung by Rob Thomas of Matchbox Twenty PERIOD Smooth spent twelve weeks at No PERIOD  on the Billboard Hot  becoming the last No PERIOD  single of the 1990s PERIOD Supernatural reached No. on the U.S PERIOD album charts and the followup single Maria Mariafeaturing the The Product GB also hit No PERIOD  spending ten weeks there in the spring of  PERIOD Supernatural eventually sold over  million copies in the United States making it Santanas biggest sales success by far PERIOD

Santana will release his newest album Shape Shifter in May PERIOD Shape Shifter is his thirty-sixth album and is a 13song instrumental force featuring tracks spanning from the late 1990s to the present PERIOD

Nicole is a senior majoring in journalism at Stony Brook University PERIOD She joined The Statesman fall semester of her freshman year and expects to continue writing for them until she graduates later this year PERIOD She couldnt be happier being the AE editor and looks forward to expanding her writers involvement with the paper PERIOD Her favorite experience in the arts section was covering the  Tribeca Film Festival PERIOD
While Nicole does enjoy the arts she has a passion for international affairs PERIOD Currently she can speak three different languages and doesnt plan on stopping there PERIOD One day she hopes to work for Al Jazeera or the BBC PERIOD
